title: eclipse项目缺少必需的库，求解1
author: 萌萌彩虹羊
txt_content:
出现了以下3个错误
Project 'Minecraft' is missing required library: 'C:\Users\Administrator\.gradle\caches\minecraft\net\minecraftforge\forge\1.7.10-10.13.4.1448-1.7.10\start'Project 'Minecraft' is missing required library: 'C:\Users\Administrator\Music\1\forge-1.7.10-10.13.4.1448-1.7.10-src (1)\unresolved dependency -  forgeBin 1.7.10-10.13.4.1448-1.7.10'
The project cannot be built until build path errors are resolved
 表示我在'C:\Users\Administrator\.gradle\caches\minecraft\中没有找到net


重新安装源代码都不能解决
求发一个完整.gradle文件夹，谢谢了{:10_503:}

replies.txt_content:
萌萌彩虹羊 发表于 2015-7-12 08:58
FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
...我使用F.O.W.的...试试挂VPN？

replies.author: 萌萌彩虹羊
replies.txt_content:
qwerard 发表于 2015-7-11 20:44
libraries缺失了东西吧？
额，我说的是forge src,不是游戏QAQ

replies.author: 天蝎_心殇
replies.txt_content:
第一次运行时：gradlew setupDecompWorkspace --refresh-dependencies
第一次运行，或更新了依赖的 API 后：gradlew eclipse
两个都要打，如果是Windows
第一次打 gradlew.bat setupDecompWorkspace
第二次打 gradlew.bat eclipse
